translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, that is Thomas Middleditch.
translation.zh:
‎女士们先生们
‎那位是托马斯·米德蒂奇

translation.en: -That's Benjamin Schwartz. -We are Middleditch and Schwartz.
translation.zh:
‎-那位是本杰明·施瓦茨
‎-这里是《两个男人一台戏》

translation.en: Everything tonight will be made up on the spot.
translation.zh: ‎今晚的一切内容将全在现场即兴编出

translation.en: Every character, every word, every sentence,

translation.zh: ‎这是一场长时长的即兴表演

translation.en: and we're very excited to bring it in a special form.
translation.zh:
‎我们很激动能带给大家
‎这种特殊的表演形式

translation.en: What we're going to do right now,
Thomas is going to ask the audience a question.
Please answer it in a real way, and we'll have a conversation.
translation.zh:
‎请正经地回答这个问题
‎我们会进行一段对话

translation.en: We might ask a question or two.
Thomas, do you have a question for the audience?
translation.zh: ‎托马斯 你想好问观众的问题了吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I do, I do, I do.
Uh...is there anything coming up in the near future
translation.zh: ‎大家有没有什么近期要发生的事情

translation.en: that you might either be excited about
or dreading in some kind of way?
Are you getting married to a man or woman?
translation.zh:
‎你是要跟男人结婚呢
‎还是要跟女人结婚？

translation.en: You're in the wedding, but you...
translation.zh: ‎明明是他们结婚 但你却…

translation.en: -from the perspective of that. -That is interesting.
translation.zh:
‎-从参加婚礼的角度来说
‎-确实挺有意思

translation.en: And they're right next to you?
So, you are in the wedding party for this.
translation.zh: ‎那么 你要参加他们的婚礼

translation.en: Can you talk a little bit about the wedding itself?
translation.zh: ‎可以请你再讲讲婚礼本身的事吗？

translation.en: They got the venue nailed down...
It's insane to me that you're explaining...
translation.zh:
‎这让我觉得很不可思议
‎竟然是你在解释…

translation.en: -This is how weddings should be explained. -Yeah.

translation.zh: ‎介绍下参与其中的每一个人

translation.en: Um, we all met each other,
like the group of friends that are in the wedding
all met each other at music festivals.
translation.zh: ‎都是一起在音乐节上认识的

translation.en: How long has this pod of pals been going on?
translation.zh: ‎你们这帮好伙伴认识了有多久呀？

translation.en: That's a great year, though. It's a good year for making friends.
translation.zh: ‎那年挺棒的 那是个交朋友的好年份

translation.en: I have so many questions for the wedding couple.
translation.zh: ‎我有好多问题想问要结婚的新人哦

translation.en: Like, "What up with friends you grew up with?"
translation.zh:
‎比如：“你们小时候
‎一起长大的朋友们呢？”

translation.en: No, you fucking went to Burning Man once,
translation.zh: ‎不请？你他妈就去了一次“火人节”

translation.en: Only friends we met in a Walmart parking lot.
translation.zh:
‎只请了我们在沃尔玛停车场里
‎认识的朋友

translation.en: All your friends you met in a Walmart parking lot?
translation.zh:
‎你们全部的朋友
‎都是在沃尔玛停车场认识的？

translation.en: Can you give us... Tell us who's in that batch of friends
translation.zh: ‎跟我们讲讲这群… ‎在沃尔玛停车场里认识的朋友都有谁

translation.en: that you met in a Walmart parking lot.
translation.zh: ‎在沃尔玛停车场里认识的朋友都有谁

translation.en: He is a friend of a friend, who...
Do you not have friends of friends?
But a friend of a friend to get bumped to the wedding party
translation.zh:
‎但作为一个朋友的朋友
‎升级到能参加婚礼聚会

translation.en: -You've got to be a good dude. -That's a fast bond.
translation.zh:
‎-你肯定是个好人
‎-进展很快啊

translation.en: When I fall for a friend, I fall hard.
translation.zh: ‎每次我爱上朋友时 都爱得很彻底

translation.en: Yeah, it's time you take over. Go.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 是该到你把话茬接过去了 说

‎-我觉得是时候了
‎-我也这么想

translation.en: -I want it from this guy, -I want to hear it too.
translation.zh:
‎-我正想听这个家伙说呢
‎-我也是

translation.en: So, basically, they tried to ditch us,
translation.zh: ‎他们本来是想把我们给甩了的

translation.en: and the only reason we found them
was because I happened to pull in to a supermarket parking lot--
translation.zh:
‎是因为我碰巧停在了
‎同一个超市的停车场里

translation.en: When they were trying to ditch you, you caught up to them.
translation.zh:
‎他们原来想甩掉你们的
‎但你凑巧撞见了他们

translation.en: Yeah, so then there was an awkward moment real quick.
translation.zh: ‎是的 然后大家都尴尬了那么一会儿

translation.en: -And now I'm in the wedding. -That's amazing.
translation.zh:
‎-而现在我要去参加婚礼了
‎-真精彩啊

translation.en: Give us descriptions of who these people are. Like...
translation.zh:
‎给我们描述一下
‎他们都是些怎样的人

translation.en: Another one is my, uh, college roommate's best friend from high school.
translation.zh:
‎另一个是我的大学室友
‎高中最好的朋友

translation.en: I like that as like an identifier of who that person is...
translation.zh:
‎我很喜欢的一点是
‎他把这当做那个人的主要描述之一…

translation.en: -I'm my college roommate's... -Who is that person?
translation.zh:
‎-“我是我大学室友的…”
‎-那是个怎样的人

translation.en: Um, he was my boyfriend in sixth grade.
So, you went out with him.
-Not no more, girl. -In sixth grade, what was he like?
translation.zh:
‎-现在不一样咯 姑娘
‎-六年级的他是怎样的？

translation.en: We all are in sixth grade.
You were fucking short then, too.
So, when you're in the wedding party, sir,
translation.zh: ‎那么 既然你去参加婚礼 先生

translation.en: I want to ask you, are you the best man?
translation.zh: ‎我想问问你 你是伴郎吗？

‎-我不知道我们知不知道诶
‎-不

translation.en: Did you just find that out now?
No, no, that fucking thing right there.
translation.zh: ‎不 不是 我们说的是那个鬼东西

translation.en: -Whatever that is. -Tell us about that post in front of you.
translation.zh:
‎-不晓得那是什么玩意
‎-对 跟我们说说你面前的那根柱子

‎-不晓得那是…
‎-这位美丽的女士是谁？

translation.en: She wasn't there. This is my girlfriend.
translation.zh: ‎她当时不在场 我女朋友

translation.en: She was invited, but she didn't want to go.
translation.zh: ‎她被邀请了 但她不想去参加

translation.en: -This is going to be... -I told you that in confidence.
translation.zh:
‎-这场表演将会…
‎-“我是偷偷跟你说的呀”

translation.en: This is going to be on Netflix where everybody can watch it.
translation.zh:
‎这场表演将还会被放上NETFLIX
‎到时候大家都能看到

translation.en: I know it feels like a normal one of our shows
translation.zh:
‎我知道这感觉像是
‎我们往常的表演一样

translation.en: where everybody tells their deepest, darkest secrets.
translation.zh:
‎大家会把自己隐藏得最深
‎最黑暗的秘密说出来

translation.en: She wasn't invited to the festival.
That's what we were asking. Okay.
Anybody else in the group you'll talk about?
translation.zh: ‎你还想说说团体里的其他人吗？

translation.en: We have a friend who's a nurse.

translation.zh:
‎-我都没办法…
‎-等等 所以你…

translation.en: sixth grade shorty ass, fucking, ex-boyfriend
translation.zh: ‎跟那个六年级时 矮不拉几的前男友

translation.en: is still around in your life?
-He's in the wedding party. -Yeah, he's my best friend.
translation.zh:
‎-他也会来参加婚礼
‎-是啊 他是我最好的朋友

translation.en: You all listen to live music.
Anything else you want to ask, or do we do an improv show now?
translation.zh:
‎还有想问的么
‎还是说可以开始即兴表演了？

translation.en: -Let's do an improv show. -Okay, ladies and gentlemen,
translation.zh:
‎-开始即兴表演吧
‎-好 女士们先生们

translation.en: thank you very much. We appreciate all four of you guys.
translation.zh:
‎非常感谢大家
‎我们很感激你们四个

translation.en: So, for the rest of the show, nobody else has to talk.
translation.zh:
‎好了 接下来的节目中
‎你们就不用再说一句话了

translation.en: Thank you all so much for being here.
Without further ado, we present to you Middleditch and Schwartz.
translation.zh:
‎废话不多说
‎我们向大家呈现《两个男人一台戏》

translation.en: -Do you need anything? Do you think? -Huh?
-Do you need anything? -I'm good for now.
-Just making the rounds. -I'm good for now.
-This is awesome. -Thanks, man. I appreciate it.
I mean, I'd never do what you do.
I'd never do what you're doing. Sorry. Get married?
translation.zh:
‎-永远也不会做你即将做的事 抱歉
‎-结婚？

translation.en: I wouldn't. But that's so cool, man. That's awesome.
translation.zh:
‎换了我可不会 不过这样也好
‎哥们 真挺棒的

translation.en: Is everybody good? Is everybody here?
translation.zh: ‎大家都准备好了吗？都到场了？

translation.en: I think so, yeah. I'm just checking in with you.
translation.zh:
‎应该是的 嗯 我只是来…
‎看看你好不好

translation.en: -You know? -[exhales] They say you get nervous.
You get a little nervous right before.
translation.zh: ‎在开始前 你会有些紧张

translation.en: -So, this is normal, what I'm feeling. -Of course.
translation.zh:
‎-所以这是正常的 我现在的感觉
‎-当然了

translation.en: -You're going to change your life. -Yeah, for the better.
translation.zh:
‎-你的人生要从此改变了
‎-对 变得更好

translation.en: Yeah. For me it would be worse.
translation.zh: ‎是的 换了是我 会变得更糟

‎-她挺有趣的
‎-她是挺有趣 对

translation.en: Yeah. Give me another attribute about her.
Uh... I met her fou-- five years ago.

translation.zh:
‎-多谢 这很有帮助
‎-还是四年前来着…

translation.en: -It's just weird. You know what I mean? -You know what's weird, actually?
translation.zh:
‎-我只是感觉有点怪怪的 你明白么？
‎-你猜什么很怪来着？

translation.en: I just found out... I probably shouldn't tell you this.
translation.zh:
‎我刚刚得知…
‎我可能不该跟你讲这件事的

translation.en: No, go, go, go. Come on.
translation.zh: ‎不 说吧说吧 拜托了

translation.en: -Is it going to fuck me up a little or no? -Uh...
translation.zh: ‎这会让我留下一点点精神创伤吗？

translation.en: Is it going to fuck me up a little, or no?
translation.zh: ‎这会让我留下一点点精神创伤吗？

translation.en: Be honest. Right now I feel pretty nervous.
translation.zh: ‎要说实话 我现在感觉很紧张

translation.en: Is it going to fuck me up, or no?
translation.zh: ‎会不会让我留下精神创伤吗？

translation.en: I shou-- I'm not going to tell you.
Um... I actually am going to tell you.
So, I just found out that...

translation.zh: ‎我的未婚妻跟矮子保罗交往过？

translation.en: -And it was pretty serious. -Wait, stop. Just so I get it in my head.
translation.zh:
‎-而且还挺认真的
‎-住口 先等一下 让我搞搞清楚

translation.en: The guy who listens to music?
translation.zh: ‎你说的是听音乐的那个家伙？

translation.en: I mean, it was years ago.
You're not talking about the singer Sean Paul?

translation.zh: ‎对 矮子保罗 我们那朋友

translation.en: -Uh... -Because Sean Paul is here too, somewhere.
translation.zh:
‎因为肖恩·保罗也来了
‎不知在哪个地方呢

translation.en: Did not know that, but that's awesome.
translation.zh: ‎我之前还不知道 但这挺棒的

translation.en: That's insane. She never said it to me once.
translation.zh: ‎难以置信 她从没跟我提过

translation.en: She's known that kid since they were little kids.
translation.zh: ‎她很小的时候 就认识那小子了呀

translation.en: It was a long time ago.
That's just what I heard. It was ages ago.
translation.zh: ‎我这么听说的 说是很久之前

translation.en: But, apparently it was pretty serious.

translation.zh:
‎-哥们 听着…
‎-谁在乎呢 对吧？

translation.en: Everybody's dated a lot of things before they get--
Can you do me a favor?
You're my best man. I need you to do me a favor.
translation.zh: ‎你是我的伴郎 我需要你帮个忙

translation.en: -Look me in the eyes. -I'm your best man?
No, I was gonna-- That's fine.
translation.zh: ‎不 我本来是要… 没什么的

translation.en: When you meet him, you'll know.
translation.zh: ‎等你见过他 你就明白了

translation.en: I don't trust my fucking brother. Okay?
Sebastian is like... He's so... It...
He's always trying to impress people.
translation.zh: ‎他总想着怎么当着别人面表现自己

translation.en: Who cares? You know what I mean?
But he can front flip from the top of the house
translation.zh:
‎但他能站在屋顶上 ‎-前空翻跳进泳池里啊
‎-没错

translation.en: But you, I mean you're number seven out of seven.
translation.zh: ‎而你… 你本来是第七名垫底的

translation.en: You just got fucking ranked up.

translation.zh: ‎没什么 今天就是婚礼了

‎-马上要举行了 好吗？
‎-好的

translation.en: I should have told you way before this.
I'm going to be honest with you.
It's because everybody else dropped out.
translation.zh: ‎选你是因为其他人都退出了

translation.en: They didn't want to be best men. They wanted to get hammered.
translation.zh:
‎他们都不想做伴郎
‎只想喝个酩酊大醉

translation.en: They didn't want to think of a speech.
translation.zh: ‎他们不想费脑子想婚礼致辞

translation.en: -Sure. -Okay, but can you do me a favor?
translation.zh:
‎-当然
‎-好 但能帮我个忙吗？

translation.en: Just go to Short Paul and make sure he's not gonna do that weird thing
translation.zh:
‎去找矮子保罗谈谈
‎确保他不会干出什么奇怪的事来

translation.en: where you snap out in the middle of the reception.
translation.zh: ‎就是那种结婚进行到一半突然发疯

translation.en: and you're like, "I say something mean."
translation.zh: ‎站起来说：“我要说不好听的话了”

translation.en: The part of the wedding where the minister says,
"Does anybody want to say something mean?"
translation.zh: ‎“在场有人想说些不好听的话吗？”

translation.en: The part of the wedding where the minister says...
translation.zh: ‎就是那部分 当主持人在婚礼上说…

translation.en: -I just want to make sure-- -I'm gonna--
I'm going to ask him if he's planning on saying anything mean.
translation.zh:
‎我会去问问看
‎他打不打算说些不好听的话

translation.en: I mean, that's cool. I'll do that.
Of course. I'm your best man now, so...
translation.zh: ‎应该的 现在我是你的伴郎了 所以…

translation.en: Listen, I know we've only known each other for three years.
translation.zh: ‎听着 我知道我们才认识了三年

translation.en: And I know at the beginning you were barely going to come.
translation.zh:
‎我知道最开始的时候
‎差点都没邀请你

translation.en: You were the last person on our invite list.
translation.zh: ‎你是我们邀请名单上的最后一个

translation.en: Like, I even told... I told Kathleen.
translation.zh: ‎我甚至都跟凯瑟琳这么说的

translation.en: I was like, "I don't think so."
Just in case everybody else fucks you over,
translation.zh: ‎到时候万一所有人都坑你的话

translation.en: you'll want a real dingbat to come in there."
translation.zh: ‎你需要一个真正的傻瓜来救场”

translation.en: Did she call me a dingbat?
Yeah, she called you a dingbat.
Yeah, I know. I want to do this.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 我知道 我也想做

translation.en: There's a reason why we cosmically met at that place.
translation.zh:
‎我们在那个地方遇见
‎冥冥之中是有原因的

translation.en: -You know what I mean? -Yeah, at the parking lot.
translation.zh:
‎-你懂我意思不？
‎-嗯 在那个停车场

translation.en: -Okay. I'm ready. I'm in it. -You were born for this.
translation.zh:
‎-嗯 我准备好了 我同意了
‎-你就是为此而生的

‎-嘿 老兄
‎-哟 你好么 老兄

translation.en: Hey man, go do the thing. I've got to talk to my brother.
translation.zh:
‎嘿 哥们 去办事吧
‎我得跟我弟弟谈一谈

translation.en: Hey, he could stay if he wants.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 要是他想的话 也可以留下来

translation.en: Uh... no! Uh... I've got some stuff to do.
Dude, so I just figured you haven't talked to me about it yet,
translation.zh: ‎我想你大概是没找到机会跟我谈

translation.en: but probably I should get to my best man speech,
translation.zh:
‎但我应该要准备一下
‎伴郎致辞什么的了吧

‎但我应该要准备一下
‎伴郎致辞什么的了吧 ‎嗯 是啊

translation.en: Let me tell you how it goes, and you could just give me notes.
translation.zh:
‎我先跟你说说看
‎好让你给我提点意见

translation.en: When I came out the doctor was like,
translation.zh: ‎我呱呱坠地时 医生都惊呆了
‎“哇 连着的该不是另一个婴儿吧”
‎这就是塞巴斯蒂安呀 宝贝

translation.en: Anyway, I had a pretty good life.
translation.zh: ‎话说 我这辈子过得挺幸福的

translation.en: Uh... I think about it a lot lately, and you know...
translation.zh:
‎我最近一直在想这件事 ‎你们知道么
‎有一回我站在珠穆朗玛峰上

translation.en: You know, one time I jumped off Mount Everest
translation.zh:
‎你们知道么
‎有一回我站在珠穆朗玛峰上 ‎一跃而下 双脚着地

translation.en: two people are getting married, Boopity-bop, bippity-bam.
translation.zh:
‎今天有俩人要结婚了
‎因为所以 科学道理

translation.en: I drop the mic into champagne.
translation.zh: ‎我把麦一丢 落进香槟里

translation.en: I pick it up. I drink the champagne out of the mic...
translation.zh: ‎再拿出来 把麦里的香槟喝掉…

translation.en: Throw the mic into the audience. Shit, is that a yo-yo?
translation.zh:
‎把麦扔进人群里
‎我去 这是个悠悠球吧？

translation.en: I do five minutes of really cool stand-up.
translation.zh: ‎我讲五分钟非常酷的单口相声

translation.en: I sing three of the most popular songs you've ever heard of in your goddamn life.
translation.zh:
‎再唱三首你他妈这辈子
‎听过的最火爆的劲歌

translation.en: -Okay? And then I put the mic-- -I told you,
translation.zh:
‎-好么？然后我把麦…
‎-我跟你说过的

translation.en: -no copyrighted songs at the wedding. -It's fine. It's fine.
translation.zh:
‎-婚礼上不能唱有版权的歌
‎-没事的 别担心

translation.en: Is that cool? If so, I'm going to head out.
translation.zh: ‎这样行不？如果行的话 我就出去了
‎不 塞巴斯蒂安 不行

translation.en: I mean, you could say all that stuff,
translation.zh: ‎你如果要说这些 没问题

translation.en: but, you know, on your own time.
translation.zh: ‎但你可以挑自己的时间去说

translation.en: -What do you mean on my own time? -Uh...
I'm your brother, man? What's going on?
-I know, you're my brother. -Talk to me.
I love you, you're my brother,
but instead of having you as my best man,
translation.zh: ‎但这次我不打算让你做伴郎了

translation.en: I'm going to kick you down to number seven out of seven.
translation.zh: ‎我要把你踢到垫底的第七名去了

translation.en: Okay, I'll say a joke now.
translation.zh: ‎好 现在轮到我讲笑话了

translation.en: You are... You are 100 feet tall.
That's great. That's a funny joke.
translation.zh: ‎很棒 刚才那个笑话很好笑

translation.en: But... yeah. No, we're not making jokes.
translation.zh: ‎不过… 是的 我们不是在讲笑话

translation.en: I don't think he has a name yet.
I just need Corey to step up to be best man. You know?
translation.zh: ‎我要科里来做伴郎 明白么？

translation.en: He and I have gotten real close over the past three years.
translation.zh:
‎他和我在过去的三年中
‎走得越来越近了

translation.en: Well, come on. You're going to drink champagne out of the microphone?
translation.zh: ‎拜托 你还打算从麦克风里喝香槟呢

translation.en: People will go fucking crazy for it, man. You don't trust me. You never trusted me.
translation.zh:
‎大家看到了肯定会疯狂欢呼的
‎你不信任我 你就从来没信任过我

translation.en: But that makes the whole speech about you. It's my day. It's my wedding day.
translation.zh:
‎但这么一来你就变成致辞的主角了
‎这可是我的大婚之日 应该以我为主

translation.en: You know, it's cool. I don't want to fuck you up on your wedding day.
translation.zh: ‎好的 没关系 我不想把你的婚礼搞砸

translation.en: Do I get to sit at the table with you guys at the dais, or no?
translation.zh: ‎那我能跟你们一起坐在礼台上吗？

translation.en: you want to sit at the table with me my new...
That kind of thing is just like me and her, though, you know?
translation.zh: ‎那应该是专属于我和她的 你说呢？

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, yeah. I'll go fucking wait in the parking lot.
translation.zh: ‎行了行了 我他妈去停车场里等着

translation.en: I've got a bow tie and a tie.
translation.zh: ‎我戴了领结 又戴了领带

translation.en: If I was your best man, I'd tell you you look stupid,
translation.zh:
‎如果我是伴郎的话
‎我就会说你看上去很傻了

translation.en: This is how they're doing it.
Even if I'm not your best man,
I can fuckin'...I can help you out.

translation.zh: ‎谢谢 谢谢你 塞巴斯蒂安

translation.en: -I'm proud of you. -I'm proud of you too.
You're two months sober, man. That's crazy.
translation.zh:
‎你已经两个月没沾酒了 哥们
‎这也太疯狂了

translation.en: It's even darker that I was going to drink champagne at the toast.
translation.zh:
‎本来会更黑的
‎我原来打算在敬酒的时候喝香槟

translation.en: You know what? I'll just see you out there. Alright?
translation.zh:
‎你猜怎么着？
‎我们就到时候见吧 好么？

translation.en: I don't know if you can see me. I won't be at the table.
translation.zh:
‎我也不知道见不见得到了
‎我连桌子都没得坐

translation.en: Yeah, I know what Sean Paul sounds like.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 我听得出肖恩·保罗的声音

translation.en: I'm Maid of Honor. I'm good.
translation.zh: ‎我是首席伴娘 我挺好的

translation.en: Yeah, good to see you too. Uh...
Good to see you too... Marnie.
translation.zh: ‎很高兴能见到你… 玛尔妮

translation.en: -Your name is Marnie. -I'm gonna do this.
translation.zh:
‎-你的名字叫玛尔妮
‎-你非要这样么

‎-你穿裤子来参加婚礼的？
‎-是啊

translation.en: I shouldn't have to wear... a dress.
translation.zh: ‎我应该不用穿… 礼服来的

‎-确实是个“想穿啥就穿啥”的场合
‎-是啊

translation.en: No, I didn't come by myself.
translation.zh: ‎不 我不是自己一个人来的

translation.en: I'm with Lisa, you know, but...

translation.zh: ‎丽莎啊 我刚还在外面碰见她呢

‎-她是个甜心 人很好
‎-她很酷呢

translation.en: -Do you want me to stomp it? -I got it!
translation.zh:
‎-要我帮你踩灭么？
‎-我自己可以！

translation.en: Anyhow, yeah, just, you know, outside...
translation.zh: ‎不管怎样 那个 你懂的 到外面来…

translation.en: -You know. -I know. I wanted to get some air.
translation.zh:
‎-你知道的
‎-是啊 我也想透透气

translation.en: -Have a smoke. -Everybody's going crazy in there.
translation.zh:
‎-抽个烟
‎-大家在里面都跟疯了似的

translation.en: It's kind of a nerve-wracking thing, I guess.
translation.zh: ‎这事还真有点令人焦虑不安

translation.en: No, I'd love to get married.

translation.zh: ‎丽莎就挺不错的呀 对吧？ ‎还可以吧

‎-她看起来人超好的
‎-她是很贴心

translation.en: She is... She is so funny.
Do you ever just want to go up nice and close
translation.zh:
‎你有没有过这种想要… ‎走到她跟前 靠得很近
‎把她的呼气全吸走的冲动？

‎走到她跟前 靠得很近
‎把她的呼气全吸走的冲动？

translation.en: You said go... I'm sorry, I must have misheard.
translation.zh: ‎你说你想走… 抱歉 我肯定是听错了

translation.en: You said go up nice and close and...
translation.zh: ‎你说走到她跟前 靠得很近…

translation.en: You know, go up nice and close to her and...
translation.zh: ‎就是走到她跟前 靠离她很近很近…

translation.en: get your mouth close to her mouth, and suck her breath out,
translation.zh:
‎把你的嘴紧贴着她的嘴
‎把她的呼气全吸走

translation.en: and now you have her breath in you...
translation.zh: ‎这样一来她的呼吸就在你的身体里…

translation.en: -Yeah, I don't know. In case we... -Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 我也是随便说说 如果你也…

translation.en: Probably... you know. I don't know.
I've never done that, but I didn't know...
translation.zh:
‎我还从没这么想过
‎但我之前还不知道…

translation.en: Have you known her for some time?
I mean, I'm her maid of honor. I haven't heard her speak about you.
translation.zh:
‎我可是她的首席伴娘诶
‎我从没听她说起过你
‎太疯狂了吧 一次也没有？

translation.en: Well, Paul. Everyone calls me Short Paul.
translation.zh: ‎我叫保罗 但大家都管我叫矮子保罗

translation.en: Paul. I think I've heard of Paul.
translation.zh: ‎保罗… 我好像听到过保罗

‎-我不太…
‎-等等 当她提到我时

translation.en: and she doesn't say short, she just says Paul?
translation.zh: ‎她不叫我“矮子” 只叫我“保罗”？

‎-对 她为什么要…
‎-我的天呐
‎是啊 因为大家都这么叫

translation.en: I mean, it's just how these guys know me.
translation.zh: ‎这些家伙都觉得我就是个矮子

translation.en: I think so. Have we said anything else?
translation.zh: ‎好像是的 我们有说过别的名字吗？

translation.en: I think we... said your name, but I can't remember.
translation.zh:
‎我们好像有说过你的名字
‎但我记不得了

translation.en: -My nickname is Amber. -I thought it was Lisa.
translation.zh:
‎-我的昵称叫安伯
‎-我还以为叫丽莎来着
‎也许吧 我的昵称叫安伯

translation.en: Your nick-- your nickname is Amber?
translation.zh: ‎你的昵称… 你的昵称叫安伯？

translation.en: Your nickname is just another first name?
translation.zh: ‎你的昵称只是另一个普通的名字？

translation.en: For this moment, it's easy for my nickname to be Amber.
translation.zh:
‎考虑到现在的情况
‎我的昵称叫安伯比较容易一点

translation.en: -You want me to call you by your nickname? -Sure.
translation.zh:
‎-你想让我用昵称来称呼你吗？
‎-好呀

‎-其实我可爱婚礼了…
‎-等等 这样一来…

translation.en: Hold on. We've got to figure this out.
translation.zh: ‎等一下 我们得把这事搞清楚了

translation.en: I don't think there's much to figure out?
translation.zh: ‎好像没什么需要搞清楚的吧

translation.en: No, because then I don't know
translation.zh: ‎不 因为这样一来 我就不太确定

translation.en: if I know my girlfriend's name.
translation.zh: ‎我知不知道我女友的名字了

‎-丽莎是你女友
‎-是我女友来着

translation.en: I was trying to make you look good.
translation.zh: ‎我刚才是为了给你留个面子

translation.en: Yeah. I didn't want to call you out
that you were calling me your girlfriend's name.
translation.zh: ‎你在用你女友的名字称呼我

translation.en: -No, no, no, but you have a name. -My name is Amber!
translation.zh:
‎-不 但你刚才是说了你的名字…
‎-我的名字叫安伯！

translation.en: How do I forget my sister's name?
translation.zh: ‎我怎么把妹妹的名字都给忘了呢？

translation.en: -I forgot that you said it. -So, hold on,
your parents named two daughters Marnie and Marnie?
translation.zh:
‎你父母给两个女儿分别取名叫
‎玛尔妮和玛尔妮？

‎-玛尔妮 是的
‎-玛尔妮 也称安伯

‎-我叫保罗 人称矮子保罗
‎-保罗 丽莎

translation.en: And we can call that guy Dave if you want.
translation.zh:
‎我们可以叫那家伙戴夫
‎如果你想的话

translation.en: We got a lot of people hanging out here today.
Yeah, and we have so many more.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 而且还有更多人要出现

‎-毕竟是他妈的婚礼嘛
‎-可不是嘛

translation.en: I am... That's why I'm nervous.
translation.zh: ‎我… 所以我才这么紧张 其实…

translation.en: I'm actually... I have to say a speech today.
translation.zh: ‎今天我要上台致辞 而大家都…

translation.en: Yeah, and it's weird because I get emotional when I think about
translation.zh:
‎是的 感觉挺奇怪的
‎因为我一想到我的过去

translation.en: my past and how we grew up together and stuff like that. You know?
translation.zh:
‎我们怎样一起长大之类的
‎我就控制不了情绪 你明白么？

translation.en: Why? What happened in your past?
There's a thing that happened, right?
translation.zh: ‎发生了一件事 这么说吧

translation.en: I don't think you want to know.
Even thinking about the past makes me realize how much I've grown
translation.zh:
‎哪怕是随便一想过去
‎就让我感觉到自己变老了这么多

translation.en: -and how much of my life is over. -That's crazy.
translation.zh:
‎-我的生命已经度过了这么多
‎-太疯狂了

translation.en: -Weddings scare me because of that. -I had something happen in my past too.
translation.zh:
‎-就因为这个 婚礼会让我害怕
‎-过去也有件事发生在我身上

translation.en: Do you want me to shuffle it?
Okay. Not a lot of people know this,
translation.zh: ‎好吧 这件事不太有人知道

translation.en: but me and Kathleen, we used to... [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎但我和凯瑟琳… 我们曾经…

translation.en: That's insane. I've known her for, like, 15 years.
translation.zh: ‎不会吧 我认识她有… 15年了吧

‎-什么时…
‎-好久了 你们认识前

translation.en: I don't know how old that makes you.
-No, fourteen, you're at grade eight. -No, twelve.
translation.zh:
‎-不 14岁的话 你已经读初二了
‎-不 12岁

translation.en: Because that's when I went to a bunch of bar mitzvahs and bat mitzvahs.
translation.zh:
‎因为就是那段时间
‎我参加了一堆别人的成人礼

translation.en: I'd say sixth or seventh grade.
You guys went out? Did you...?
Sixth grade. Did you kiss or anything?
translation.zh: ‎六年级 你们有接吻过什么的吗？

translation.en: We made love under the moon.
-When you were in sixth grade? -For nights on end.
We couldn't get enough of each other.
I wrote a poem, she wrote me poems.
translation.zh: ‎我写了一首诗 她也给我写了一首诗

translation.en: We got in trouble together, we ran from the law.
translation.zh: ‎我们一起闯祸 一起干犯法的事

translation.en: We thought about moving to Germany.
How long did this all last?
You know, the brightest suns burn the briefest.
translation.zh:
‎你知道的
‎最明亮的太阳 总是燃烧得最短暂

translation.en: There's just the one sun, we just have the one sun.
translation.zh: ‎太阳只有一个 我们只有一个太阳

translation.en: You are telling me that the entire universe has only one sun?
translation.zh:
‎你的意思是
‎在浩瀚宇宙中就只有一个太阳？

translation.en: -That we know of. -Are you a flat-earther?
translation.zh:
‎-据我们所知
‎-你是地平论者吗？

translation.en: But I do think if I had slippery enough shoes,
translation.zh:
‎但我相信
‎如果我穿上足够滑的鞋子

translation.en: and you took me to one part, I could slide all the way to the end.
translation.zh:
‎你能把我放到一个地方
‎我可以滑到另一头去

translation.en: Your theory on the world is that
if you had slippery enough shoes...
translation.zh: ‎如果你穿上了足够滑的鞋子…

translation.en: ...you could fly from one end to the other.
translation.zh: ‎你可以从世界的一头飞到另一头

translation.en: I don't think the world is flat.
I don't think the Earth is flat.
And because it's round, if you get enough momentum...[chuckles]
translation.zh:
‎正因为它是圆的
‎如果你有足够的动量…

translation.en: I suppose if you had slippery enough shoes.
translation.zh: ‎如果你穿足够滑的鞋子的话

translation.en: What happened? How did it end?
You already told me you made love in sixth grade.
translation.zh:
‎你都已经告诉我
‎你六年级的时候做过爱了

translation.en: We were in a taxi cab.
We had just seen... We had just... seen the opera...

translation.zh: ‎身上穿着我们最华丽的衣裳

translation.en: I think I know what's going to happen. [laughs]
-Can I guess? -And a guy came out...
translation.zh:
‎-可以让我猜么？
‎-然后一个家伙突然跳出来…

translation.en: Did he try to steal her pearls?
He tried to steal the pearls.

translation.zh: ‎还有一个小孩亲眼目睹了这一切

translation.en: Because that's not even all that embarrassing,
translation.zh: ‎因为这还没到丢人的部分呢

translation.en: but then the guy with the clown mask slipped,
translation.zh: ‎然后那个戴着小丑面具的人滑了一跤

translation.en: and the gun went in the air,
and I tried to grab it.

translation.zh: ‎然后我… 我不小心打中了…

translation.en: the guy in the clown mask?
I don't know why you're looking at me like you're confused.
translation.zh: ‎我不明白你干嘛要一脸疑惑地看着我

translation.en: -And you look like the fool. -And I had one moment
translation.zh:
‎-而你看起来像个傻瓜
‎-我本来有机会…

translation.en: to say a really cool line
And Kathleen, she looks to me like I'm crazy.
translation.zh:
‎然后凯瑟琳 她看着我的眼神
‎好像我是个疯子似的

translation.en: I don't want to kill the guy. Ah...
-This is crazy. -I've been to therapy every year of my life.
translation.zh:
‎-太疯狂了
‎-为了这事我每年都去做心理治疗

translation.en: Is that why she didn't see you?
The police were like, "Yeah, self defense."
translation.zh: ‎警察说什么：“嗯 这是正当防卫

translation.en: But, did you say something cool?
-Like, "Get out of my life, clown." -"Oopsie, doopsies."
translation.zh:
‎比如 ‘从我面前消失吧 小丑’
‎诸如此类的”

translation.en: I said. "Oopsie, doopsies," and then the whole...
translation.zh:
‎我说：“哎呦喂呀”
‎于是所有的警察…

translation.en: When I met Dave, the story that he tells even though he's like,
translation.zh: ‎我认识戴夫时 他跟我说的版本是…

translation.en: "I don't want to tell it right now."
translation.zh: ‎尽管他一副“我不想现在说”的样子

translation.en: is that he saved her from a robber?
They said they met when they were really young,
like seventh grade or something like that. Right?
And he said that he saved her from being robbed.
translation.zh: ‎他说他从抢劫犯手上把她救了下来

translation.en: You ever have a time in your life
translation.zh: ‎你这辈子有没有过这样的一刻

translation.en: when you think you might come to a conclusion,
translation.zh: ‎当你觉得应该要做个了结了

translation.en: and then you think, "Maybe I'll just wait it out,"
translation.zh: ‎你却又想说：“也许我应该再等等”

translation.en: and you're like, "No I'm definitely going to do it."
translation.zh:
‎让你下决心说：
‎“不 这件事我非做不可”

translation.en: -I'll see you in a bit. Okay? -Okay.
And so the time has come...
Dave, if that is your real name,
translation.zh: ‎戴夫 如果你真叫这个名字的话

translation.en: and Kathleen, you will be mine.
translation.zh: ‎而凯瑟琳 你终将属于我

translation.en: Okay, I'm, um, um, I'm ready.
Yeah. Is she coming? Is Kathleen coming?
Do I see her when we go down the aisle?
Is the first time I see her right when this happens? When do I see her?
translation.zh:
‎要等到那个时候么？
‎什么时候才能看到她？

translation.en: You can't just say you're a ghost then disappear.
translation.zh: ‎你可不能撂下一句我是鬼就闪人啊

translation.en: We'll find out who you are later.
translation.zh: ‎晚一点我会搞清楚你到底是谁的

translation.en: Corey! Hey man, I need my best man for a second.
translation.zh: ‎科里！嘿 我很需要我的伴郎帮个忙

translation.en: I...I...I don't know... I don't...I don't...
You didn't get to talk to him at all?
translation.zh: ‎我不… 你一句话也没跟他说上吗？

translation.en: No, no, I couldn't find him.
Just sit next to him if you see him, and just make sure he's going to be fine
translation.zh:
‎如果你看到他了
‎就坐到他旁边去确保他…
‎…乖乖的 不要说什么不好听的话

translation.en: We're going down, but I don't know...
When does Kathleen come? When's the part where we walk down...?
translation.zh:
‎凯瑟琳什么时候来
‎我们什么时候走出去…

translation.en: We announce you, then you come out.
translation.zh: ‎我们会宣告的 到时候你再出来

translation.en: And then we announce Kathleen, then she comes out.
translation.zh:
‎然后我们会宣告凯瑟琳
‎然后她再走出来

translation.en: I wish we had a handshake, but we haven't known each other long enough.
translation.zh:
‎真希望我们有个特别的握手
‎可我们认识的时间还不够长
‎我了个去 那是我哥哥耶

translation.en: Hey. Come on. Give it up.
-Come on, Dave! -I think you're supposed to be up there.
translation.zh:
‎-来呀 戴夫
‎-好像没安排你坐这么前面吧

translation.en: Yeah, I guess I'll be all the way in the back,
the last fucking person on the line.
Oh, oh! I won't make a big deal out of it.
I guess I'm their mom, then.
-Nice to meet you. [laughs] -Lovely to meet you.
I knew, I knew Dave would get married.
We knew it in the back of our minds.
I just want you to be loose, okay?
translation.zh: ‎我只是想让你随便一点 好么？

translation.en: Don't tell me to loosen up when I'm already loose.
translation.zh:
‎我明明很随便的时候
‎别一直叫我随便

‎-这样只会让我绷得更紧
‎-哈罗德！

translation.en: -Harold! -Do you want me tight or loose?
translation.zh:
‎-哈罗德！
‎-你想让我紧绷还是随便？

translation.en: Then don't 'aks' me to be loose.
What do you want me to do? How do you want me to make you loose?
translation.zh:
‎你想要我怎么做？
‎要我怎么做你才能随便一点？

translation.en: By not asking me to be loooooose! [shouting]
I'm, I'm sorry, is everything okay? Are you okay?
translation.zh: ‎不好意思 一切都好吧？你没事吧？

translation.en: I'm the father of the bride. [chuckles]
-By the way, pleasure to meet you. -Lovely to meet you.
translation.zh:
‎-对了 认识你很荣幸
‎-很高兴认识你

translation.en: I feel like we should have met before at some point in time.
translation.zh: ‎虽然我感觉我们之前就应该见过了

translation.en: Oh my God, it is so nice to meet you.
translation.zh: ‎我的天呐 能认识你真是太好了

translation.en: -It's so nice to meet you. -I'm, I'm the mother of the bride.
Pleasure to meet you too for the very first time.
translation.zh:
‎我也很高兴认识你
‎初次见面请多指教

translation.en: Good, I'm fine. Are you okay?
translation.zh: ‎挺好的 我很好 你没事吧？

translation.en: Everybody's asking me if I'm loose.
What about you? Are you loose?
I don't think you should... [laughing] ask a woman if--
translation.zh:
‎我觉得你不该问一个女人
‎她随便不随便…

translation.en: -You were about to say it. Say it. -But I...
translation.zh: ‎都说了一半了 就说出来呀

translation.en: Say it. I've never heard the phrase before.
translation.zh: ‎说吧 我还从没听过这个说法

translation.en: It's not something you ask a lady.
translation.zh: ‎这种话你是不该让淑女说的

translation.en: But I am loose as a caboose.
-We do like to have fun. -We have fun.
translation.zh:
‎-我们可喜欢说笑了
‎-我们爱说笑

translation.en: -We do like to have fun. -We're quite... We're...
We're half a bottle into a chardonnay.
translation.zh: ‎我们… 我们… 我们喝了半瓶霞多丽

translation.en: -Oh! That's so lovely. -Can I pour you--?
translation.zh: ‎真是太好了 要不要也给你倒…

translation.en: I would love some. Is that okay?

translation.zh:
‎-嗯 当然了
‎-祝新娘和新郎

translation.en: Here you go. Knocked that back pretty quick.
Well, okay, now I have your trash. Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 你的垃圾就这样给我了

translation.en: I'm ready if you want to play the trumpet.
translation.zh:
‎我准备好了
‎如果你想吹个小号什么的话

translation.en: I can't... I don't really know... many musical instruments.
translation.zh:
‎我不会…
‎我对演奏乐器什么的不太在行

translation.en: That's fine. Just whatever you can do. Please.
translation.zh: ‎没关系 随便挑个你会点的 尽力就行

translation.en: You're my maid of honor. Just do your thing.
translation.zh: ‎你是我的首席伴娘 按你的来就行

translation.en: What do they have in here?
-Marnie, come on, quick. -I know. I know.
translation.zh:
‎-玛尔妮 拜托 快点
‎-知道了

translation.en: -I've got to find something that I can-- -Everybody's waiting.
translation.zh:
‎-我总得找个我能…
‎-大家都在等着呢

translation.en: Agh, I just realized that it's so weird
that our parents aren't bringing us down the aisle. Keep going. Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎父母没来接我们走走廊
‎这样真的有点奇怪 你继续吧
‎是啊 这点才是最奇怪的

translation.en: If that side is the groom's side
translation.zh: ‎如果那一半是新郎那边的亲友

translation.en: -What? -We're all people from the music festival.
♪ Rock and rock and roll, roll, roll, roll ♪
♪ Pooh, rock and rock and roll, roll, roll, roll ♪

translation.zh: ‎我想要… ‎在场的所有人 双方的家人
‎在场的所有人 双方的家人

translation.en: and the rock and roll enthusiasts...
We are both here under our own volition.
I don't think this is part of the wedding ceremony.
translation.zh: ‎我感觉这好像不是婚礼的一部分
‎是的 当然了 是自愿的

translation.en: Has this happened enough times where you have to ask this?
translation.zh:
‎这种事情是不是经常发生
‎才逼得你不得不问？

translation.en: This is how I do it.

translation.zh:
‎-你要求我…
‎-好了 这些不用问了

translation.en: Mm... I wish I was fucking closer.
-I wish I was fucking closer. -Oh, yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-我他妈真希望能近一点
‎-噢 对了
‎在场有人希望自己能近一点吗？

translation.en: I wish I was fucking closer.
What do you want me to do? Be over there?
You gonna make me be a worm? Is that what turns into a butterfly?
translation.zh:
‎你想逼我做条虫？
‎做个变蝴蝶的那玩意？
‎不 那是反… 不 不是的！

‎-是毛毛虫 去你的
‎-你这是在…

translation.en: you're doing exactly what I didn't want you to do.
translation.zh: ‎我好说歹说叫你别做这样的事

translation.en: When you tell someone not to do something,
you know, they're going to do it.
both of you are in love,
you have prepared your own vows.
before we get to those vows...
Does anybody have anything mean [chuckles] to say?
translation.zh: ‎在场有人想说些不好听的话吗？

translation.en: What the fuck is this? "Anybody have anything mean to say?"
translation.zh:
‎他妈什么玩意？
‎“在场有人想说些不好听的话吗？”

translation.en: Um... okay, the short gentleman in the back.
translation.zh: ‎好的 坐在后面的那位矮先生

translation.en: What're you doing? You'll ruin the whole thing for them.
translation.zh:
‎你干什么啊？
‎你会把他们的婚礼给毁掉的

translation.en: I got something mean to say.
This is my daughter's special day. Okay?
translation.zh: ‎这是我女儿的大婚之日 明白吗？

translation.en: Well, if it's so special, why are you half... lit?
translation.zh:
‎如果真有那么重要的话
‎你怎么半醉半醒的？

translation.en: This whole time, all these years...
you've been telling everybody, her included.
translation.zh: ‎你一直跟大家说 包括她在内

‎-保罗 你干什么啊？
‎-连她也骗

translation.en: What are you doing? Paul, what are you doing?
translation.zh: ‎你干什么啊？保罗 你该干什么？

translation.en: -What the fuck are you doing? -That way back when in the alleyway,
translation.zh:
‎-你他妈干什么啊？
‎-好久以前 在那条小巷里

translation.en: when I stopped the clown robber,
translation.zh: ‎明明是我制止了那个小丑抢劫犯

translation.en: it was you who stopped the clown robber.
Were you just taking credit just because I said "Whoopsie, doopsie?"
translation.zh:
‎就因为我说了“哎呦喂呀”
‎你就能抢走我的功劳吗？

translation.en: You should stop talking right now. Okay?

translation.zh: ‎保罗 给过你一次机会了

translation.en: You're embarrassing me. My parents are here.
translation.zh: ‎你这是在让我丢人 ‎我的父母都来了

translation.en: My entire parking lot is here.
I got something mean to say?
Taking credit for other people's murders is not cool.
translation.zh: ‎抢别人谋杀的功劳可不像话

translation.en: Especially when the consequences are true love.
A love that I always had and will never know again.
translation.zh:
‎一段我曾经拥有
‎却永远也无法得到的爱

translation.en: I didn't even want to come to this wedding.
translation.zh: ‎我本来就不想来参加这场婚礼

translation.en: Excuse me. Excuse me. Excuse me. Excuse me. Excuse me.
Sorry, the show's already started. You can't leave.
translation.zh:
‎抱歉 节目已经开始了
‎你现在不能离场

translation.en: You got the bouncer from the music festival to come to the wedding?
translation.zh: ‎你把音乐节的门卫请到婚礼上来了？
‎好吧 速战速决 保罗

translation.en: If you're the type of guy that steals other people's murders
translation.zh: ‎如果你是那种 偷走别人的谋杀

translation.en: and, consequently, steals other people's true loves...
translation.zh: ‎继而又偷走别人的真爱的人…

translation.en: are some kind of fucking...du-- dumbass.
translation.zh: ‎就是某种… 他妈的… ‎笨…笨瓜

translation.en: He could have said the perfect thing and he blew it.
translation.zh:
‎他本来有机会说句狠话的
‎但他说砸了
‎嘿 保罗 你猜怎么着？

translation.en: Why don't we let the lady decide.
You really think you had something with her?
translation.zh: ‎你真的认为 你跟她之间有过真爱？

translation.en: Oh, yeah, of course I did.
if something is said that's mean enough,
translation.zh: ‎如果有人说了 足够不好听的话

translation.en: on the spot, the lady can decide.
I've been dating you since the seventh grade.
translation.zh: ‎自从初一起 我就一直跟你在交往

translation.en: Paul's been dating me since the sixth grade.
translation.zh: ‎保罗自从六年级起就在跟我交往了

translation.en: I mean, not actively. We just had a moment.
translation.zh:
‎我是说 不是一直在交往
‎我们只是有段过去

translation.en: Why is there a microphone being lowered? [chuckles] Um...
We did a little bit more than kiss.
translation.zh: ‎我们做的 比接吻要多一点点

translation.en: Yeah. We made sweet, sweet love.
We made love every kind of way you could ever dream of.
translation.zh: ‎各种你能想到的爱 我们都做了

translation.en: We went to peep shows and got all excited
translation.zh: ‎我们去看了色情西洋镜 性奋不已

translation.en: and then fucked on the dirty little...
I don't want to know anymore.
Look him in the eyes and choose.
translation.zh: ‎看着他的双眼 做个选择

translation.en: Me or him. Just look him in the eyes and choose.
translation.zh:
‎选我还是他
‎看着他的双眼做个选择

translation.en: Let me tell you something before you choose, okay?
translation.zh: ‎在你做出选择前 我要告诉你一件事

translation.en: I've... I've loved you since the moment I saw you.
-That was right after we had sex. -Yes!
translation.zh:
‎-那是在我们刚做完爱后
‎-没错！
‎下作的方式！真正下作的方式！

translation.en: And I know he thinks he knows what love is, but I...
translation.zh:
‎我知道他以为自己知道
‎什么叫做爱… 但我…

translation.en: have felt it since the moment I saw you.
translation.zh: ‎从我见到你的第一眼 就感觉到了

translation.en: And I'm telling you that I saved your life that day.
translation.zh:
‎而且我要告诉你
‎那天是我救了你的命

translation.en: So, if it's just some weird thing you have because he saved your life,
translation.zh: ‎所以如果这一切是因为他救了你的命
‎我儿子还在等着呢 快选呀！

‎-亲爱的 西-屋-俺 选吧
‎-选吧

translation.en: you could actually prove that you did that?
or is this just another figment of your imagination?
translation.zh:
‎还是说这只是你
‎凭空想象出来的东西？

translation.en: You were so creative as a sixth grader.
translation.zh: ‎你六年级的时候想象力可丰富了

translation.en: You want me to prove that I actually murdered the guy?
translation.zh: ‎你想让我证明 我真把那家伙杀了？

translation.en: Is there any way you could do that?
I was the clown that day.
Yes, and I can tell you how it went down.
translation.zh:
‎没错 我可以告诉你
‎那天到底发生了什么

translation.en: I went to steal your... pearls
right in the alley after the opera.
translation.zh: ‎就在歌剧结束后的那条小巷里

translation.en: I was like, "Why are two sixth graders going to the opera?
translation.zh:
‎我当时想：
‎“为什么俩六年级生会去看歌剧？

translation.en: This will be an easy steal."
I snatch your pearls, they go all over the place.
translation.zh: ‎我一把抓过你的珍珠 ‎珍珠散落得到处都是

translation.en: First of all, you look great tonight.
translation.zh: ‎首先我得说 你今晚很美
‎你看起来棒极了 但保罗呢？

translation.en: Thank you. I look great too.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你 我看起来也很棒

translation.en: I can't hear you. Say it again.
You didn't try to save the day.
translation.zh: ‎不是你挺身而出 拯救了她

translation.en: My gun fell, you slipped, you hit me,
translation.zh:
‎是我的枪掉了 你滑了一跤
‎不小心打中了我

translation.en: And I'm being pretty cool about it.
translation.zh: ‎而且 我也没怎么怪你们

translation.en: that the gun just went in the air and...
translation.zh: ‎那把枪飞到了空中 然后…

translation.en: and no one pulled the trigger other than it sort of falling,
translation.zh: ‎没人按下了扳机 只是枪自己落下

translation.en: -And that's how you died? -I'm telling you,
the only way you can make your decision is love
translation.zh: ‎你的这个决定 要依靠爱来做

translation.en: I'll still be the priest if you want.
translation.zh:
‎我可以继续做你的牧师
‎如果你愿意的话

translation.en: I think you're going to want to hear this.
Um... you treated me real... nice, but real intense.
translation.zh: ‎你对我很好 但也很激烈

translation.en: -We had a great time in sixth grade. -We had the best time.
translation.zh:
‎-我们六年级时 有过一段美好的时光
‎-最好的时光

‎-那段是最好的时光
‎-但是 保罗啊

translation.en: I'm a woman now. A lady, even.
translation.zh:
‎我现在是一个女人了
‎甚至可以说是一个淑女

translation.en: And I think you got to let the past be the past, you know?
translation.zh:
‎我觉得你应该让过去的事
‎就这样过去 你说呢？

translation.en: You wanna fuck one more time?
Corey, dude, you were supposed to stop...
translation.zh: ‎科里 大哥 你本该阻止…

translation.en: -if he was going to do anything crazy. -Shit!
translation.zh:
‎-以防他干出什么疯狂的事来
‎-糟糕！

translation.en: -I didn't do the one thing. -You had one thing to do,
translation.zh:
‎-我一件事也没做成
‎-你就只有一个任务

translation.en: Buddy, I got no other choice.
I've got to bump you to the back of the line.
translation.zh: ‎我只能把你踢到队伍的末尾去了

translation.en: No, come on, man. Is this for real?
translation.zh: ‎不会吧 哥们 你认真的吗？

‎-你是我的弟弟
‎-别骗我 哥们

translation.en: -Is this is for real? -Of course, it's for real.
After we do our little thing here,
you want to do your routine?
-Can I stand right there? -Of course you can.
translation.zh:
‎-我可以站在那边吗？
‎-当然可以了

translation.en: I love you too, baby, baby bro.
translation.zh: ‎我也爱你 宝贝… 宝贝弟弟

translation.en: You've got to kiss each other.
Now, let's get down for the party.
I think my best man's got something to say.
my second-born has something to say.

translation.zh: ‎我说了 你们好吗 混账东西们？

translation.en: Give me a beat. Give me a beat. Give me a beat.
I don't want to say a fancy speech.
Just want to say I love you both very much.
translation.zh: ‎我只想说我非常地爱你们俩

translation.en: And I can see why you guys fit perfectly together.
translation.zh: ‎我能看得出为什么你们俩是天生一对

translation.en: And I don't have to wish you luck because I know you'll be alright.
translation.zh:
‎而我也不用祝你们好运
‎因为我知道你们肯定会好好的

translation.en: I love you, and I love you.

translation.zh: ‎这就是我在人间的未尽之事

translation.en: No, somebody stop him. He's a robber.
translation.zh: ‎不要啊 来个人拦住他 他是个抢劫犯

translation.en: -He's an actual robber. -I'm going to Heaven.
translation.zh:
‎-他是个名副其实的抢劫犯啊
‎-我要上天堂了
